pr_title: CB-10351: Improve exception logging when aws api throws exception during Rds creation

timeline.bodyText: it is not ignored anymore. Could you please rename it?
timeline.author: topolyai5

timeline.message:
CB-10351: Improve exception logging when aws api throws exception during Rds creation
Currently when the stackDescribe API call failing the code is ignoring the AmazonServiceException. Therefore we don't what was the error.
In this fix I've added exception logging and I extended our CloudConnectorException with the original exception as root cause.

CB-10351: Improve exception logging when aws api throws exception during Rds creation
Currently when the stackDescribe API call failing the code is ignoring the AmazonServiceException. Therefore we don't what was the error.
In this fix I've added exception logging and I extended our CloudConnectorException with the original exception as root cause.
